H5983.def: = nation; ◄ situated E. of river {L:Jordan<SDBH:יַרְדֵּן>}; according to {S:00101903800100200} founded by {L:Ben-Ammi<SDBH:בֶּן־עַמִּי>}, son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>}

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H369.def: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non-existant

H3423.def: = process by which humans gain ownership of land and other possessions, which often implies that these possessions will be passed on to the next generation

H4069.def: = a reference to the cause, reason or purpose of an event; normally used in  questions with the purpose of identifying that cause, reason, or purpose; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that these things cannot be identified

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H4421.def: = armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

H8643.def: = loud sound ◄ produced either by the human voice or by musical instruments ► used to express an emotion or to communicate something to a community

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H784.def: = state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.

H3341.def: = action by which someone causes something to start burning, usually with effects on people and nature around; ≈ associated with punishment and judgement

H2296.def: = state in which someone wears clothes or armor

H8242.def: = relatively large receptacle ◄ made out of leather or cloth; ► used for the storage and transportation of food and possibly other objects as well

H5594.def: = action by which human perform the mourning ritual for someone who has died, or for another tragic event; this may include {L:wailing<SDBH:ילל>}, tearing one's clothes, putting on {L:sackcloth<SDBH:שַׂק>}, covering oneself with dust or ashes, {L:fasting<SDBH:צום>} or eating specific food, {L:cutting oneself<SDBH:גדד>}, {L:shaving one's head<SDBH:קרח>}, covering part of one's face, etc.; this usually takes place during a specific period of time and ends after the burial has taken place, but it may also be repeated in later days to commemorate a tragic event

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H2421.def: = process by which humans are alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity

H490.def: = woman whose husband has died and therefore has difficulty caring for herself; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker members of the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the aliens, the fatherless, and other people who are poor

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H369.def: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non-existant

H4941.def: = a situation where one party has a dispute with another party, and is looking for a legal ruling in which they receive what they consider to be rightfully theirs

H3563.def: = small, bowl-shaped container ► used for drinking; ≈ often used figuratively to denote one's portion in life, received from God

H5352.def: literally: to be cleaned out; hence: = causative action by which a city is deprived of its inhabitants

H7650.def: = action by which humans or deities make a solemn statement often calling on a higher power to confirm that what is said is true or to punish the speaker if it turns out not to be true

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H8047.def: = state in which an area has become empty as a result of destruction and depopulation

H2781.def: = state in which humans feel shame and humiliation, ◄ due to one's own shortcomings or misfortune and/or contempt from other people

H2721.def: = state in which an object is free from moisture or liquid

H7045.def: = actions by which humans or deities consign other humans or deities or inanimate objects to death, damage, or destruction, usually by invoking the name of a deity if the agent is human; ◄ this is done as punishment, out of contempt, fear, anger, or hostility, or because one was paid to do so; ► the effectiveness of a curse partially depends on the authority of the one pronouncing it

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H7971.def: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

H6908.def: = action by which humans or animals come together as a group for a common purpose

H959.def: = state in which someone considers someone or something else unworthy of attention or respect, and shows that by his/her actions

H120.def: = human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between {L:male<SDBH:זָכָר>} and {L:female<SDBH:נְקֵבָה>}; ≈ associated with mortality

H2087.def: = state in which humans have an exalted status in their own eyes, resulting in a failure to see the limits of what is permitted or appropriate in view of one's status, and act accordingly; ≈ often associated with sin, disobedience, foolishness, aggression, and rebellion against God

H3820.def: = the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

H5377.def: = action with which a person gives money or something of value to another person with the expectation that it will be paid back or returned

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H2288.def: = area that is difficult to reach, ◄ located within mountains or rocks, ► which people may use as a temporary or permanent dwelling-place; ≈ and is regarded as relatively safe

H1361.def: = state in which a person or object is of great or more than average height; ≈ associated with status

H5307.def: = process by which humans, animals, or objects move from a higher level to a lower level, typically at a high speed and without control

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H5488.def: meaning unsure; probably: = a reed-like plant, which grows in water and reaches a height of up to 3 m high; its fuzzy brown seed head becomes fluffy and blows away in the wind; ◄ Typha genus; ► used for baskets and mats; its roots are edible

H3220.def: = a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

H5404.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = a grouping of large birds of prey with keen eyesight; ► unclean and therefore not to be eaten; ≈ associated with large size and great strength, ability to fly great distances at high speed; symbol of protection, metaphor for God, but also symbol for death in battle

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H1675.def: = action by which a bird moves swiftly downwards ► in order to capture its prey; ≈ often used metaphorically to refer to an army attacking the enemy

H6566.def: = causative action by which humans spread out an object, such as a piece of cloth, a net, or a document either horizontally or vertically

H3671.def: = part of body; ◄ of bird, insect, celestial creature; ► used for flying but also to give protection

H1224.def: = area enclosed by a stone wall or hedge made of branches and thorns, with a narrow opening which can be closed with brush or by the shepherd’s body; ► used for keeping sheep at night to protect them from thieves or wild animals

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H3820.def: = the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

H123.def: = man; usually referred to as {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}; brother of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>}; ► ancestor of the {L:Edomites<SDBH:אֲדֹומִי>}

H1368.def: = a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H1834.def: = town; ◄ in {L:Syria<SDBH:אֲרָם>}; ► capital of one of the {L:Aramaean<SDBH:אֲרָם>} kingdoms

H2574.def: = town, area; ◄ on Orontes river in {L:Syria<SDBH:אֲרָם>}; ► capital of {L:Aramean<SDBH:אֲרַמִּי>} kingdom; its inhabitants were relocated to {L:Samaria<SDBH:שֹׁמְרֹון>} by the king of {L:Assyria<SDBH:אַשּׁוּר>}

H954.def: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status

H4127.def: = process by which a relatively hard object becomes softer

H3220.def: = a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

H1674.def: = state in which humans experience fear, anxiety, or distress ◄ out of uncertainty of what might happen to themselves or their beloved ones; ► which may express itself in trembling and shaking of the body

H3201.def: mostly used in a negated clause; = state in which an activity cannot be carried out, as a result of a lack of skill, strength, or ability of the agent, or other circumstances that make the activity impossible

H8252.def: = state in which an inanimate object does not move

H1834.def: = town; ◄ in {L:Syria<SDBH:אֲרָם>}; ► capital of one of the {L:Aramaean<SDBH:אֲרָם>} kingdoms

H6437.def: = action by which humans or animals turn their body to face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H5127.def: = action by which humans move to another place in haste, ► in order to escape from a dangerous situation

H2388.def: = state in which humans or deities are strong in a physical, political, or military sense, or simply in their ability to convince others with words

H6869.def: = a process by which humans go through extremely difficult circumstances, resulting in severe anxiety, ◄ as if one were confined to a narrow and cramped space from which there is no escape

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H8416.def: = action by which humans express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to deities about who they are and what they do

H5800.def: = action by which humans or deities move away from an object, person, or place

H7151.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H4885.def: poetic term; = state in which humans, deities, and animals feel and show great joy

H970.def: = a young, fully grown, unmarried male ► associated with joy and strength

H5307.def: = process by which humans, animals, or objects move from a higher level to a lower level, typically at a high speed and without control

H7339.def: = central part of a city where people meet and where civic and commercial activities take place, usually at the intersection of streets and roads

H582.def: = human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H4421.def: = armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H5002.def: = action by which humans or deities make a prophetic statement; in the case of a deity this is usually done through the mouth of a prophet or seer

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H6635.def: = state of being in the service of the community; ≈ sometimes associated with suffering and heavy labor

H3341.def: = action by which someone causes something to start burning, usually with effects on people and nature around; ≈ associated with punishment and judgement

H784.def: = state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.

H2346.def: = structure surrounding a building, a collection of buildings, or a town; ◄ made out of stone; ► provides protection; ≈ associated with strength, safety, and the ability to resist attacks from outside

H1834.def: = town; ◄ in {L:Syria<SDBH:אֲרָם>}; ► capital of one of the {L:Aramaean<SDBH:אֲרָם>} kingdoms

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H759.def: = building or part of a building that has been fortified to provide additional security; often connected to the palace

H6938.def: = man; ◄ second son of {L:Ishmael<SDBH:יִשְׁמָעֵאל>}; ► founder of ethnic group

H4467.def: = state in which a person or deity has been entrusted with the office of {L:king<SDBH:מֶלֶךְ>} or {L:queen<SDBH:מַלְכָּה>}

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H894.def: = town; ◄ in {L:Mesopotamia<SDBH:שִׁנְעָר>}; ► founded by {L:Nimrod<SDBH:נִמְרֹד>}; location of "tower of Babel"; capital of {L:Chaldean<SDBH:כַּשְׂדִּים>} empire

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H7703.def: = action by which humans or wild animals attack other humans and kill, destroy and steal in the process

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H168.def: = construction ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► used as a temporary residence by nomads, soldiers, shepherds, and even as a sanctuary

H6629.def: = group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd

H3407.def: = long strip ◄ of cloth, usually made out of goat's hair or linen, ► sewn together to form larger pieces of cloth used as covering for a tent or for separating one room from another

H3627.def: = human-made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes

H5375.def: = process by which an object increases in height

H1581.def: = large quadruped mammal, which may reach a height of 2 m. or more; dromedaries are bigger and a uniform light fawn color; bactrians are darker; they are suited to life in desert areas, store excess food in their humps, can go without water for long periods, and can make long journeys through dry areas; ◄ Camelus dromedarius and Camelus bactrianus; ► they are used for riding and for carrying heavy loads and pulling carts; their hair is woven into cloth used for making tents or outer robes; their milk is used as food and drink; ≈ they are a symbol of wealth and commerce, but unclean and not to be eaten

H7121.def: = action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

H4032.def: = state in which humans live in a place which is not their place of origin or nationality, either permanently or for a substantial period of time

H5127.def: = action by which humans move to another place in haste, ► in order to escape from a dangerous situation

H5110.def: = process by which objects shake or move back and forth ◄ because of being unstable or when agitated by an outside force

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H5002.def: = action by which humans or deities make a prophetic statement; in the case of a deity this is usually done through the mouth of a prophet or seer

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H5019.def: = man; ◄ son of Nabopolassar; ► king of {L:Babylon<SDBH:בָּבֶל>} from 605-562 B.C. who led the people of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>} into exile

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H894.def: = town; ◄ in {L:Mesopotamia<SDBH:שִׁנְעָר>}; ► founded by {L:Nimrod<SDBH:נִמְרֹד>}; location of "tower of Babel"; capital of {L:Chaldean<SDBH:כַּשְׂדִּים>} empire

H3289.def: = action by which humans or deities exercise their minds to determine how they are going to achieve a particular purpose

H2803.def: = action by which humans exercise their {L:mind<SDBH:לֵב>} with regard to something

H4284.def: = procedure for achieving a certain purpose, originating from someone's לֵב mind

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H7961.def: = state in which humans can live without fear or concerns, which is either or not appropriate depending on the situation

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H983.def: = state in which humans live with confidence and without fear; ≈ often regarded as carelessness, especially when there is no mention of trust in YHWH

H5002.def: = action by which humans or deities make a prophetic statement; in the case of a deity this is usually done through the mouth of a prophet or seer

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H1817.def: = a hinged barrier at the entrance to a town, building, or room; ◄ usually made out of wood, but occasionally also out of metal; ► provides or prevents access; ≈ sometimes associated with vulnerability

H1280.def: a long rigid piece of wood, metal, or similar material, attached in horizontal position to a construction to give it strength and stability

H910.def: = the state of being apart from significant others

H1581.def: = large quadruped mammal, which may reach a height of 2 m. or more; dromedaries are bigger and a uniform light fawn color; bactrians are darker; they are suited to life in desert areas, store excess food in their humps, can go without water for long periods, and can make long journeys through dry areas; ◄ Camelus dromedarius and Camelus bactrianus; ► they are used for riding and for carrying heavy loads and pulling carts; their hair is woven into cloth used for making tents or outer robes; their milk is used as food and drink; ≈ they are a symbol of wealth and commerce, but unclean and not to be eaten

H957.def: = all sorts of goods, taken forcibly from an enemy in war

H1995.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects produce a variety of sounds, sometimes associated with natural phenomena like heavy rain and the waves of a stormy sea

H4735.def: = an animate or inanimate object ◄ acquired by humans by means of a financial transaction or in another way

H7307.def: = an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)

H7112.def: = causative action by which humans remove part of an object with a sharp tool

H6285.def: = one of the sides or corners of an object

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H343.def: = extremely difficult circumstances ► resulting in grief, poverty, sickness, and/or death

H5002.def: = action by which humans or deities make a prophetic statement; in the case of a deity this is usually done through the mouth of a prophet or seer

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H4583.def: = a location that deities, humans or animals have made their dwelling place; ≈ associated with security

H8577.def: = mythical sea monster, such as {L:behemoth<SDBH:בְּהֵמֹות>} and {L:leviathan<SDBH:לִוְיָתָן>}

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H5769.def: = a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H120.def: = human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between {L:male<SDBH:זָכָר>} and {L:female<SDBH:נְקֵבָה>}; ≈ associated with mortality

H1481.def: = state in which humans live in a place that is not their place of origin or nationality, either permanently or for a substantial period of time

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H5030.def: = male person speaking on behalf of a deity

H5867.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Shem<SDBH:שֵׁם>}; ► regarded as founder of a nation with the same name

H7225.def: = point in time at which an event starts happening

H4438.def: = state in which a person or deity has been entrusted with the office of {L:king<SDBH:מֶלֶךְ>} or {L:queen<SDBH:מַלְכָּה>}

H6667.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Chenaanah<SDBH:כְּנַעֲנָה>}; ► false prophet; time of king {L:Ahab<SDBH:אַחְאָב>}

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H5867.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Shem<SDBH:שֵׁם>}; ► regarded as founder of a nation with the same name

H8064.def: = the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H5769.def: = a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

H2865.def: = state in which the surface of the soil is broken into many pieces

H1245.def: = action by which deities, humans, or animals make an intensive effort to locate (other) humans, animals, objects, or activities, which often requires them to move from one location to another

H5315.def: = the part of the body connecting the head to the rest of the body and containing the passageways for blood, air, and food; ≈ associated with breathing, appetite, and life and often used metonymically to refer to the entire body and the personality inhabiting it

H2740.def: = process by which objects become extremely dry ► and therefore highly inflammable

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H3615.def: = process by which an activity comes to full completion

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before
